name: Gamera's Binding :: Time Odyssey
description:
Info

Game for ScriptLine Game Jam!

Made by DevNugget!

Play as a Knight from the year 1266, the king set you on a quest to kill the Kaiju "Gamera"... However---- the rest is for you to find out!

This game is super short and story-based!

Sequal to my first game jam game Gamera's Binding!

Controls

Move Right - D

Move Left - A

Jump - Space

Sword - Left Mouse Button

Shoot Gun - Right Mouse Button
